comments.comment: Katha karala wedak nhe kollo ape mha unoth muslim thrastha wadhinta puka dhenawa bang .penawane thurkiye thrastha wadhin 50 dhenek evith innawa kiyala dhenagena my 3 pala ponnaya mokakdha gaththu kriya marga .thrasthawadhi lankawe jathiyanthara paasal pawa dhagena ape pake singhala nayakayo unge ammalata hukanne  muslim thrastha wadhin gen mudhal aragena ponnayo ratama paawa dhenawa wesa ballo .dhekkane saidha marudhu dhipu heti .ko ape pake swamin whasela ekek katak heriyadha ponnayo ekek viruddha unadha nhe .nikamwath unp eken saindha marudhu dhila thibunanam adha Ganasarai ,athana methana rathana  siwru kare thiyagens enne kaala kanni .yako pakshe gena ithanna epa thopi rata gena ithapalla wesa aththa.

comments.comment: Neethiya tadin kriyathamaka wenna ona eth chodana karanna epa katawat mokada api sinhala welat api athare ona taram tirisannu innawa . Api ohoma karana eken wenne api eyalawa waradi parawal walata motivate karana eka . Apita hamakenatama agilla dik karanna ba . Tamanta ee dee unot kiyala hithala balanna . Ee wagema tama muslim ayat tikak hithanna ona mechchara deyk welat burkawa paladinne nathuwa gaman karanna . Me rata deshapalanaya karana ayagen hadena ratak neme kauru mona kiuwat eka wenne na .
